lemma rb_aux_top_irred: assumes "rword_strict = rw_rat_strict" and "rb_aux_inv (fst args)" and "b \<in> set (fst (fst (rb_aux args)))" and "\<And>b0. b0 \<in> set (fst (fst args)) \<Longrightarrow> \<not> is_sig_red (\<preceq>\<^sub>t) (=) (set (fst (fst args)) - {b0}) b0" shows "\<not> is_sig_red (\<preceq>\<^sub>t) (=) (set (fst (fst (rb_aux args))) - {b}) b"
